title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Cowboys losing to the 49ers at home in the first round of the playoffs, why the final play of the game was the wrong call and how this encapsulated everything that is wrong with Dallas right now. He believes the Patriots might need to make a huge move in the offseason after getting dominated by Josh Allen and the Bills. He tells you why he was right about Joe Burrow and wrong about Jimmy Garoppolo. Plus, NFL reporter Mike Silver joined the show to provide insight on what exactly happened on the final play for the Cowboys and which head coach is already on the hot seat for next season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
